errors.invalid_settings_syntax: Invalid MCP settings JSON format. Please check your settings file for syntax errors.
errors.failed_update_project: Failed to update project MCP servers

info.project_config_deleted: Project MCP configuration file deleted. All project MCP servers have been disconnected.
